analysis.description:
Crowdsale.executeTransaction (/unique_chucks/7/0xc094d10e8c0f5f507bb986f01b0c44a83cbf8440.sol#280-293) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(beneficiary,tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/7/0xc094d10e8c0f5f507bb986f01b0c44a83cbf8440.sol#287)

Crowdsale.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/7/0xc094d10e8c0f5f507bb986f01b0c44a83cbf8440.sol#340-343) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-erc20Token.transfer(owner,balance) (/unique_chucks/7/0xc094d10e8c0f5f507bb986f01b0c44a83cbf8440.sol#343)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/7/0xc094d10e8c0f5f507bb986f01b0c44a83cbf8440.sol#206-234):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(whitelist.isWhitelisted(beneficiary)) (/unique_chucks/7/0xc094d10e8c0f5f507bb986f01b0c44a83cbf8440.sol#208-210)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSoldIco (/unique_chucks/7/0xc094d10e8c0f5f507bb986f01b0c44a83cbf8440.sol#231)
	- tokensSoldPre (/unique_chucks/7/0xc094d10e8c0f5f507bb986f01b0c44a83cbf8440.sol#219-220)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.executeTransaction (/unique_chucks/7/0xc094d10e8c0f5f507bb986f01b0c44a83cbf8440.sol#280-293):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(beneficiary,tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/7/0xc094d10e8c0f5f507bb986f01b0c44a83cbf8440.sol#287)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- contributions (/unique_chucks/7/0xc094d10e8c0f5f507bb986f01b0c44a83cbf8440.sol#289-290)
	- contributors (/unique_chucks/7/0xc094d10e8c0f5f507bb986f01b0c44a83cbf8440.sol#290-292)

Crowdsale.HARD_CAP_EUR should be constant (/unique_chucks/7/0xc094d10e8c0f5f507bb986f01b0c44a83cbf8440.sol#150-151)
Crowdsale.HARD_CAP_IN_TOKENS should be constant (/unique_chucks/7/0xc094d10e8c0f5f507bb986f01b0c44a83cbf8440.sol#153-154)
Crowdsale.SOFT_CAP_EUR should be constant (/unique_chucks/7/0xc094d10e8c0f5f507bb986f01b0c44a83cbf8440.sol#151-153)
ERC20.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/7/0xc094d10e8c0f5f507bb986f01b0c44a83cbf8440.sol#82-83)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/7/0xc094d10e8c0f5f507bb986f01b0c44a83cbf8440.sol:
